projects.title: Asteria Clicker
projects.description: An incremental idle clicker game where you collect stars and unlock upgrades.

projects.title: Veggie quiz
projects.description: A fun quiz game to find out what veggie are you. Made in StartSchool collaborative coding sessions with Carlos Mestre.

projects.title: Daily Horoscope
projects.description: A web app that provides daily horoscope readings based on your zodiac sign. Made in StartSchool collaborative coding sessions with Rolands Silins and Inga.
